doc.name: Vertex
doc.description: This attribute represents a waypoint in a relation. It extends Location, meaning that can be associated with a physical location in a visual rendition. It can optionally be associated with another instance of Vertex to indicate that there is a path from this one to the other one. Cyclic paths are not permitted, although currently that is not enforced by this class.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer and Edward A. Lee
